keywords: Security Intelligence Location Update At Scheduled Time Only
description: This setting allows you to configure security intelligence updates according to the scheduler for VDI-configured computers. It is used together with the shared security intelligence location (SecurityIntelligenceLocation).
name: SecurityIntelligenceLocationUpdateAtScheduledTimeOnly
displayName: Security Intelligence Location Update At Scheduled Time Only

options.description: If you enable this setting and configure SecurityIntelligenceLocation, updates from the configured location occur only at the previously configured scheduled update time.
options.name: If you enable this setting and configure SecurityIntelligenceLocation, updates from the configured location occur only at the previously configured scheduled update time.
options.displayName: If you enable this setting and configure SecurityIntelligenceLocation, updates from the configured location occur only at the previously configured scheduled update time.

options.description: If you either disable or do not configure this setting, updates occur whenever a new security intelligence update is detected at the location that is specified by SecurityIntelligenceLocation.
options.name: If you either disable or do not configure this setting, updates occur whenever a new security intelligence update is detected at the location that is specified by SecurityIntelligenceLocation.
options.displayName: If you either disable or do not configure this setting, updates occur whenever a new security intelligence update is detected at the location that is specified by SecurityIntelligenceLocation.
